response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its unique benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $200 for you. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 200}
